name: Daemonette
content:
Slaanesh has many servants, but the most numerous of them
are the Daemonettes. Created to fulfil the Prince of Pleasure's
every whim, Daemonettes are his courtiers and courtesans,
his warriors and messengers. Slaanesh is fickle and capricious,
oft likely to send out legions of Daemonettes to destroy any
source of frustration.
extraSubCategories:
Awareness (Per), Charm (Fel) +20, Dodge (Ag) +20,
Psyniscience (Per), Speak Language (any one).

Fearless, Lightning Attack, Lightning
Reflexes, Sprint, Step Aside, Swift Attack.

Daemonic (TB 6),
Daemonic Presence (-10, 10 meters),
Fear (2), From Beyond, Improved Natural
Weapons, Natural Weapons (Claws),
Preternatural Speed, Strange Physiology,
Unnatural Agility (x2), Warp Instability.
